text: The Lycée Français Charles de Gaulle (LCDG) in Ankara, Turkey is a French school in the Turkish capital. In the 2006–7 academic year, it has 484 pupils. Mrs. Riobè and Mrs. Ménard established the school in 1942. Its initial location was near an archaeological museum. ==References== ==External links== *Official website *Official website Charles de Gaulle Category:French international schools in Turkey Category:Schools in Ankara Category:1942 establishments in Turkey Category:Educational institutions established in 1942
title: Lycée Français Charles de Gaulle, Ankara
